instigate.simCardChangeNotifier.listeners

Class CustomDeviceAdminReceiver

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.content.BroadcastReceiver
      • android.app.admin.DeviceAdminReceiver
        • instigate.simCardChangeNotifier.listeners.CustomDeviceAdminReceiver

  • public class CustomDeviceAdminReceiver
extends android.app.admin.DeviceAdminReceiver
    Created by Vram on 10/31/13.

    This is the component that is responsible for actual device administration. It becomes the receiver when a policy is applied. It is important that we subclass DeviceAdminReceiver class here and to implement its only required method onEnabled().

    • Field Summary
